org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core
Class ReadPoint

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.ReadPoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
AntennaReadPoint
public class ReadPoint
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a readpoint. This means a single antenna, a barcode reader, ...

Author:
Markus Vitalini

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns a description of this ReadPoint. If there has been no previous call to setDescription then the returned string will have 0 length.

Returns:

getOperStatusAlarmControl

public TTOperationalStatusAlarmControl getOperStatusAlarmControl()
Returns the alarm control object which controls the conditions for generating alarms alerting a manager of changes in a ReadPoint's operational status.

Returns:
An alarm control for monitoring the operational status of the ReadPoint

increaseOperStateSuppressions

public void increaseOperStateSuppressions()
Increases the number of read point operational state change notifications that have been suppressed for this ReadPoint object by 1.

getOperStateSuppressions

Returns the number of read point operational state change notifications that have been suppressed for this ReadPoint object.
